Package javelin.controller.action.maneuver

Class Grapple

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.target.Target
        • javelin.controller.action.maneuver.ExpertiseAction
          • javelin.controller.action.maneuver.Grapple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction
    public class Grapple
extends ExpertiseAction
    TODO since one of the combatants can die while grappling due to constriction, it would make sense to do some turn-by-turn calculation of damage instead to prevent extra damage in the case of a combatant diying on the first turn of a 3-turn grapple. the turn-by-turn doesn't need to be handled by game flow, just when applying the damagein hit(Combatant, Combatant, BattleState, float).
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
